import React from "react"; const SingleProduct = (props) => { const { name, description, imageUrl, price, stock } = props; function plus() { var preValue = document.getElementById("counter").value; document.getElementById("counter").value = parseInt(preValue) + 1; } function minus() { var preValue = document.getElementById("counter").value; if (parseInt(preValue) != 0) { document.getElementById("counter").value = parseInt(preValue) - 1; } } function rotate() { document.getElementById("rotateSVG").classList.toggle("rotate-180"); } return (
